entry.title: Do the Critics Have Black Adam All Wrong? | Aftershow

media:group.media:title: Do the Critics Have Black Adam All Wrong? | Aftershow
media:group.media:description:
Special guest and DC expert Mike Kalinowski joins host Nikki Novak to discuss what's going on between the critics an the audience score for Black Adam, pledging their needs for Hawkman and Dr. Fate solo films, and THAT mid-credits scene.
